description.original: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance
description.translation: Transform the Page Preview hover popover into a fully working editor instance

dict..setName(\"Trigger hover preview on embe: .setName("在嵌入内容上触发悬停预览")
dict..setDesc(\"Allow hover preview to trigge: .setDesc("允许在悬停于任何类型的渲染嵌入内容（如图片或块引用）时触发悬停预览")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the hover editor as the a: .setDesc("打开时将悬停编辑器设置为活动窗格")
dict..setDesc(\"When double clicking to minim: .setDesc("双击最小化时，窗口将向下滚动而不是向上滚动")
dict..setDesc(`Show the view header by defaul:
.setDesc(`触发悬停编辑器时，默认显示视图标题。
         当禁用时，只有当你点击最小化按钮左侧的视图标题图标时才会显示视图标题。`)
dict..setDesc(`Click and hold an image within:
.setDesc(`在悬停编辑器内点击并按住图片以暂时最大化弹出窗口和图片以填充整个视口。
        在鼠标释放时，悬停编辑器将恢复到原始大小。`)
dict..setDesc(\"How long to wait before showi: .setDesc("在悬停于链接之前等待多久才显示悬停编辑器")
dict..setDesc(\"How long to wait before closi: .setDesc("鼠标离开后等待多久才关闭悬停编辑器")
dict..appendText(\" \"+a.name)}),v.addEventLi: .appendText(" "+a.name)}),v.addEventListener("click",()=>this.plugin.app.openWithDefaultApp(a.path)),v.setAttribute("aria-label",i18next.t("界面.嵌入默认应用打开提示")
